about_the_game:
In the beginning there were only dragons. Peoples of the realm were hiding underground with suffering.
Them suffer has ended with the emergence of 12 Druid Lords. Druid lords killed the dragon, wielded their claw, ate their meat. But they tainted their victory with each other's blood. They fought each other until Bishgoh the Phoenix a.k.a. Ancient King brought 12 lords to their knees.
The apocalypse began when the king unexpectedly disappeared on his birthday. Chaos reigned in the realm.
Everyone went crazy and got out of the way, except for one person.
Now Lieutenat Colonel Alexander Silverhand and him followers shall reorder the realm and protect people from themselves like always.
Explore the realm, write your story
Freely travel all around the realm. Write realm history as you want.
Combat system, find best turn based strategy
Outnumbered and fighting for survival. Find your enemies weakness and use that for defeat them.
Be Commander, Manage your squad
Create best team with balance. Find new voluntarily for your campaign. Keep them in order.
Crafting, Find equipment for survival
Don't forget that you are also at war with nature.
Rich Story, Enjoy the after the doomsday fantasy
Discover new stories and make important choices that shape the story.

Them suffer has ended with the emergence of 12 Druid Lords. Druid lords killed the dragon, wielded their claw, ate their meat. But they tainted their victory with each other's blood. They fought each other until Bishgoh the Phoenix a.k.a. Ancient King brought 12 lords to their knees.

name: DERELICT KINGDOM: THE ANCIENT LIE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 Skylake | AMD FX-6000
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RxX 570 | NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 Coffee Lake | AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 5700xt | NVIDIA GeForce RTX2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Derelict Kingdom is the cinematic, strategy game from one of the influential story - druid stories. Command your squad to hunt down repels, crafting for survival, protect your followers, reorder the realm and seize the crown.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
